value.title: Add or Edit Columns When Importing Data from Analysis Services into Power BI
value.excerpt: If you use SQL Server Analysis Services as a data source for Power BI, you have two types of connection; Live Connection or Import Data. value.excerpt: Sometimes, you need to create a multiplication of all sets of all pairs from two different data tables in Power BI.
